column5: Phnom Penh Municipal Police Immigration Police Received 2 New Zealanders from Oreusey I
column9: a 33-year-old New Zealand national who arrived in the Kingdom of Cambodia on 07.05-2019 at the Siem Reap International Airport and her son JAEGER WILLIAM ORVY FREEMAN
column10: 3.------Neither had a valid visa and had been causing a public nuisance (*reports also come from Kampot
column11: where the pair were recently).------After questioning
column12: police sent them to the Department of Investigation and Implementation of the General Department of Immigration.
